[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: shr()] [Attack: Fee Rounding] If vault fee calculation uses shr(fee_amount, precision) for division and rounds down, could attacker structure amounts to minimize fees via rounding? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: mod()] [Attack: Reward Distribution] If vault distributes rewards using mod(timestamp, period) for bucketing and negative timestamps produce negative buckets, could attacker manipulate to skip distributions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: or()] [Attack: Permission Escalation] If vault merges operator permissions using or(caps1, caps2) and implementation is wrong, could attacker lose permission bits and bypass operator_freeze checks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: and()] [Attack: Status Gating Bypass] If vault checks operation_allowed using and(current_status, required_status) and implementation is wrong, could attacker execute operations during disabled state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Cetus CLMM] [Tick Calculation] CLMM uses signed i32 for tick indices - if Cetus adaptor calls i32::from() with tick value and aborts, are all Cetus position operations broken? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Cetus CLMM] [Price Delta] If Cetus adaptor computes sqrtPrice delta using i32::sub() and aborts, can vault never exit Cetus positions? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Oracle] [Price Deviation] If Switchboard oracle aggregator validation computes signed price deviation using i32::sub() and aborts, can vault never update prices? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Health Limiter] [Health Factor Delta] If Navi health limiter computes health_factor_change using i32::sub() to check degradation and aborts, are all Navi operations blocked? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Vault Operations] [Value Delta Calculation] If op_value_update computes total_usd_value_delta = i32::sub(new_value, snapshot_value) and aborts, can operations never complete? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Loss Tolerance] [Comparison Logic] If vault checks i32::abs(value_delta) <= loss_tolerance_i32 using i32::lte() and aborts, does this brick loss enforcement? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Fee Calculation] [Signed Fees] If boosted rewards accrue negative fees (penalties) tracked as I32 and any arithmetic aborts, can reward distribution fail? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Share Math] [Delta Tracking] If deposit buffer tracks share_delta as I32 to handle cancellations and i32::add() aborts, can deposits never process? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Validator Weights] [Weight Adjustment] If liquid staking validator pool adjusts weights using signed deltas via i32::add() and aborts, can validator rebalancing fail? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Epoch Tracking] [Epoch Delta] If vault locking_window computation uses i32::sub(current_epoch, unlock_epoch) and aborts, can withdrawal timing checks fail? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Momentum Adaptor] [Position Value] If Momentum position value change is tracked as I32 and arithmetic aborts, can Momentum operations never complete? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Suilend Adaptor] [Obligation Delta] If Suilend obligation borrow/repay amounts are differenced using i32::sub() and aborts, can borrowed assets never be returned? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Integration: Navi Adaptor] [Account Balance] If Navi account balance changes are tracked as signed deltas using I32 arithmetic and aborts, can borrowed assets be lost? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: div()] [Precision Loss] Signed integer division truncates toward zero - if vault price calculation uses i32::div() for ratio, could truncation allow rounding exploits favoring attacker? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: shr()] [Precision Loss] Right shift loses low bits - if vault uses i32::shr() instead of proper division for share calculations, could repeated shifts accumulate rounding errors? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: mul()] [Intermediate Overflow] If vault computes (a * b) / c where a*b overflows i32 but final result fits, current API can't handle - could force vault to use lower precision and lose fees? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: abs_u32()] [Range Reduction] Converting signed to unsigned loses negative range - if vault uses abs_u32() for magnitude but later needs sign, could information loss cause logic errors? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: All] [Gas Cost] Every function call currently costs gas then aborts - if vault accidentally calls these in hot path, could gas griefing occur before abort? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: wrapping_add/sub] [Algorithmic Complexity] If implementation uses branching for overflow detection, could be slower than native ops - can attacker spam operations using i32 math to cause gas DoS? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: from() vs from_u32()] [API Confusion] Two functions to create from u32 with same signature - if vault uses wrong one, could behavior differ? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/mmt_v3/sources/i32.move] [Function: abs() vs abs_u32()] [Return Type Confusion] abs() returns I32, abs_u32() returns u32 - if vault expects I32 but gets u32, could type mismatch cause compilation or logic errors? (Low)
